sentences.sContent: ...a gruelling trip that would have daunted a woman half her age.
sentences.sCn: …即使是只有她一半年纪的女人都会感到胆怯的一次痛苦旅行。

remMethod.val: d(看作devil， 魔鬼) + aunt(姑奶奶) → 像鬼一样的姑奶奶 → 使胆怯

words.tran: 使人畏缩的；使人气馁的；令人怯步的
无畏的；勇敢的；不屈不挠的

trans.tranOther: If something daunts you, it makes you feel slightly afraid or worried about dealing with it
